thread.title: How to make an edible water "bottle" at home
thread.title_full: How to make an edible water "bottle" at home

author: yuka@inhabitat.com (Yuka Yoneda)
title: How to make an edible water "bottle" at home
text:
View Slideshow 
We were fascinated when we first came across the Ooho , an edible water “bottle” conceived by three students to reduce plastic waste, and decided to make one of our own. Check out our DIY video and DO try this at home!
